actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE payments SET 
deleted=false,
accounts_remarks={{payment_remarks.text}},
updated_time=now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval,
updated_by={{appsmith.user.email}},
amount_paid={{amount_paid_val.text}},
taxable_amt={{amount_paid_val.text}}-{{amount_paid_val.text}}*18/100,
gst_amt={{amount_paid_val.text}}*18/100,
payment_start_date={{payment_start_date.formattedDate?payment_start_date.formattedDate:null}},
payment_end_date={{payment_end_date.formattedDate?payment_end_date.formattedDate:null}},
payment_mode={{payment_mode_val.selectedOptionValue}},
transaction_id={{transaction_id_valye.text}},
transaction_date={{transaction_date_valye.formattedDate?transaction_date_valye.formattedDate:null}},
payment_source={{payment_source_val.selectedOptionValue}},
payment_status={{payment_status.selectedOptionValue}},
payment_clear_date={{payment_clear_date.formattedDate?payment_clear_date.formattedDate:null}},
payment_type={{payment_type_val.selectedOptionValue}},
payment_ticket_status='APPROVED',
payment_received_by={{payment_received_by_req.text}},
payment_clearance_status={{payment_clearance_status.isChecked}},
offer_id={{offer_code.selectedOptionValue?offer_code.selectedOptionValue:null}},
statement_id={{map_statement_id.selectedOptionValue?map_statement_id.selectedOptionValue:null}}
where payment_id={{payments_id.text}};
